attributes.title: Disgrace
attributes.review: I have had this app for less then a day, and I already hate it. It has so many glitches and it drains your battery so fast. It’s ridiculous, advise not to get it.

attributes.title: Disgusting app
attributes.review: That’s the best president we have ever had! Not Trump tho. I used this app and my cat fell into the pasta I was making. Not only did my cat die😣😭 but my pasta tasted disgusting. My house burned down too I’m homeless now 😓😓 all because if this app. VERY ANGRY

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting to be informed on the latest of our president but I was sadly mistaken. I kept receiving notifications about a man named trump and I haven’t seen President Obama. I’m super disappointed.

attributes.title: Disgraceful
attributes.review: This app was super glitchy, I’ve never seen anything like it, also I got a bunch of porn adds pop up for some reason?? My daughter clicked on it and now she is scared... ya no thanks bunker boy!

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳with🧶my🧚crazy🤪pink💝wig💇🏼‍♀️ but I☺️cant🙄get through😍the door✨because my🏡booties🎂too😚big 1 percent 🔢 is 😏 human 💁99 is 😖 plastic just 😳 a 🛑 sec 1️⃣ gotta 😏 fix🔨 my 💅🏽lip👄These💋h0es😻are💫jealous🙄cause💅🏼their🦶🏻mans🤑want🧚🏼me👀 i 👁 can’t 🚫 believe 👄 it 👨🏽‍🦲

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is not good at all! I just wanted updates on our dumb stupid old racist rapist president but it has so many glitches and it ask for my phone number!😒

attributes.title: This app took me back in time where I pooped my pants
attributes.review: Yeah so right when I opened the app it took me back to 2017 and I had to relive the time I pooped my pants😢😢 it was terrible and I don’t recommend getting it.

attributes.title: Crashes phone
attributes.review: App crashes constantly. I have never had to reboot my phone so often. Had to delete the app. Haven’t had to reboot since.

attributes.title: USELESS
attributes.review: wanted to use this app after my daily dose of cofefe but all it does is give useless information! Crashes, slow, and has the language of the 3rd grader!

attributes.title: Zero star
attributes.review: This app is very glitchy and I’m very against taking down tiktok ,I am not personally a tiktok user myself, but I know plenty of young people are just trying to have fun so that’s why I gave it one star DOWN WITH THE TRUMP APP✊🏾
